title: Michael046
author: Michael046
content: My bitmain antminer came with an amlogic control board can i change it with BB control board? Because the aml doesnt have an sd card reader? Or can i just flash the amlogic using a micro flash drive( i have a flash drive that has a micro outlet that i can be plugged in the amlogic control board ) or can i swap it with a BB board ? Thank you so much for the help..

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: Michael046 on November 09, 2023, 01:26:38 PMMy bitmain antminer came with an amlogic control board can i change it with BB control board? Because the aml doesnt have an sd card reader? Or can i just flash the amlogic using a micro flash drive( i have a flash drive that has a micro outlet that i can be plugged in the amlogic control board ) or can i swap it with a BB board ? Thank you so much for the help..maybe ðŸ¤”.First off what is the models name.S19s19 pros19 as19 ks19 js19 xpnext the exact model name for your gears psu

comments.author: Michael046
comments.body: The antminer is s19 90th model and the psu is APW121417 version B

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: Michael046 on November 09, 2023, 03:20:03 PMThe antminer is s19 90th model and the psu is APW121417 version B https://altairtech.io/product/bitmain-antminer-s19-s19-pro-t19-control-board/I think the above is good.but wait for others to check in on this pick of mine.

comments.author: Michael046
comments.body: I have already bought a BB control board for s19 will it work for my miner?

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: Michael046 on November 09, 2023, 03:28:52 PMI have already bought a BB control board for s19 will it work for my miner?well according to this link nohttps://altairtech.io/product/bitmain-antminer-s19j-control-board/but this company does have a rep here on the forum. and they will answer the question you are asking on their website.I have interchanged some s19 controllers and I can tell you they donâ€™t always work when they say they will.and sometimes they work when they say they wonâ€™t.
